attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With more and more wildlife in danger I would like to see a ban on the use of shotguns for the killing wild mallards, pheasants and wildlife in general.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban shooting wildlife for pleasure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18424


Prime Minister's Office
